General.Name: Bergbahnen Engelberg Truebsee Titlis Bet AG
General.Description: Bergbahnen Engelberg-Trübsee-Titlis AG operates as a cableway company in Switzerland. It operates excursions, summer and winter adventures, hotels, restaurants and accommodation, and shops. The company was founded in 1913 and is based in Engelberg, Switzerland.
